title: Organizational Learning Capacity-Building Program for Remote Work Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Developing remote work management competencies through experience-based learning in digital device-enabled educational environments

learning_goals: Participants can propose three or more effective communication strategies among team members in remote work environments
Participants can design and implement a digital tool-based task management system
Participants can appropriately combine and execute trust-building and motivation methods for remote work scenarios
Participants can systematically document and share organizational-level remote work learning experiences
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
